Who.Description: VOEvent created with voevent-parse, version 1.0.3. See https://github.com/timstaley/voevent-parse for details.

Param.name: Name_ID
Param.Description: Name of the optical transient

Group.name: Set-up_tel

Param.name: FOV
Param.Description: FOV of the telescope used for the observation strategy

Param.name: Mag_limit
Param.Description: Intrinsic magnitude limit of the telescope 5 sigma

Param.name: Filters_tel
Param.Description: Available filters

Group.Description: Some characteristics of the telescope used for the observations

Param.name: airmass
Param.Description: Airmass

Param.name: calib
Param.Description: Calibration for the observation

Param.name: exposure
Param.Description: Exposure time

Param.name: sequence
Param.Description: Number of same sequence down for the observation

Param.name: Ra_tile
Param.Description: The right ascension at center of fov in equatorial coordinates

Param.name: Dec_tile
Param.Description: The declination at center of the fov in equatorial coordinates

Group.Description: Coordinates of the center of the field observed by the telescope

Param.name: Url_Quicklook
Param.Description: Quicklook data

Param.name: Classification
Param.Description: Nature of the source: Supernovae, Flare star, Minor planet, Kilonovae, Orphan Afterglow ...

Param.name: Probability
Param.Description: Indicator from 0 to 1 that nature of the transient is real

Param.name: Slope
Param.Description: Fading of the transient in mag/day

Param.name: Slope_error
Param.Description: Fading of the transient in mag/day (error)

Param.name: filt_symbol
Param.Description: Symbol for the filter

Param.name: filt_system
Param.Description: System for the filter

Param.name: mag_symbol
Param.Description: Symbol used for calculating the magnitude

Param.name: mag_system
Param.Description: System used for calculating the magnitude

Param.name: Neargal_name
Param.Description: Nearby Galaxy close to the transient

Param.name: Neargal_dist
Param.Description: Distance of the near-by galaxy

Field.name: mag_error
Field.Description: Error of the magnitude for the transient

Field.name: mag_symbol
Field.Description: Symbol used for calculating the magnitude

Field.name: mag_system
Field.Description: System used for calculating the magnitude
